text: Andrew Whitelaw (19 May 1865 – 1938) was a Scottish footballer who played as a right back. ==Career== Born in Jamestown, Whitelaw played club football for Vale of Leven, Notts County, Heanor Town and Leicester Fosse, and made two appearances for Scotland. ==References== Category:1868 births Category:1938 deaths Category:Scottish footballers Category:Scotland international footballers Category:Vale of Leven F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Heanor Town F.C. players Category:Leicester City F.C. players Category:Association football fullbacks
title: Andrew Whitelaw
